name: MSI GTX 1080 Ti 11GB Armor
description: The GeForce GTX 1080 Ti was an enthusiast-class graphics card by NVIDIA. Built on the 16 nm process, and based on the GP102 graphics processor, in its GP102-350-K1-A1 variant, the card supports DirectX 12. This ensures that all modern games will run on GeForce GTX 1080 Ti. The GP102 graphics processor is a large chip with a die area of 471 mm² and 11,800 million transistors. Unlike the fully unlocked TITAN Xp, which uses the same GPU but has all 3840 shaders enabled, NVIDIA has disabled some shading units on the GeForce GTX 1080 Ti to reach the product's target shader count. It features 3584 shading units, 224 texture mapping units, and 88 ROPs. NVIDIA has paired 11 GB GDDR5X memory with the GeForce GTX 1080 Ti, which are connected using a 352-bit memory interface.
warranty: Product is thoroughly tested and completely functional without any issues. We also provide a one month warranty from our end.

name: Ryzen 5 5600G
description: AMD Ryzen 5 5600G is a desktop processor with 6 cores and 12 threads. Based on the Zen 3 architecture, this AMD processor has a base frequency of 3.9 GHz and can reach a boost frequency of 4.6 GHz. It has 32 MB of L3 cache and a TDP of 65W. The AMD Ryzen 5 5600G is compatible with AMD AM4 socket motherboards. It also supports PCIe 4.0 and DDR4 memory.
warranty: Product is thoroughly tested and completely functional without any issues. We also provide a one month warranty from our end.

name: ASUS - PB287Q - 28 inch UHD 60Hz
description: ASUS PB287Q is a 28-inch Ultra HD (3840 x 2160) monitor with a 60Hz refresh rate. It features a 1 ms response time, a 100% sRGB color gamut, and a 300 nits brightness. The monitor also has a built-in speakers with a 2W output. It is compatible with AMD FreeSync technology and has a VESA mount.

id: ASUS GTX 1660 Ti 6GB Gaming Edition OC
name: ASUS GTX 1660 Ti 6GB Gaming Edition OC
description: The GeForce GTX 1660 Ti is a performance-segment graphics card by NVIDIA. Built on the 12 nm process, and based on the TU116 graphics processor, in its TU116-400-A1 variant, the card supports DirectX 12. This ensures that all modern games will run on GeForce GTX 1660 Ti. The TU116 graphics processor is an average sized chip with a die area of 284 mm² and 6,600 million transistors. It features 1536 shading units, 96 texture mapping units, and 48 ROPs. NVIDIA has paired 6 GB GDDR6 memory with the GeForce GTX 1660 Ti, which are connected using a 192-bit memory interface.

name: SAMSUNG 80 - LS27A800UJWXXL - 27 inch UHD 60Hz
description: The Samsung LS27A800UJWXXL is a 27-inch Ultra HD (4K) monitor that offers a wide range of features and specifications to enhance your visual experience. With a resolution of 3840 x 2160, this monitor provides a sharp and detailed image, making it ideal for tasks that require high visual fidelity, such as graphic design, video editing, and gaming. The monitor supports a refresh rate of 60 Hz, which is suitable for most general computing tasks and can handle basic gaming without any significant issues. The 4 ms response time is good for gaming and general visual tasks, though it may not be as fast as some high-end models.

name: Ryzen 5 PRO 4650G
description: Through a multi-layered approach to security features, AMD Ryzen PRO Processors help businesses protect data, avoid downtime, and reduce resource drain: World’s first x86 processors integrating the Microsoft Pluton Security Processor – a chip to cloud security technology that hardens new Windows 11 OS-based PCs with continuous protection for user identity, data, and apps1 Microsoft Secured-core PC helps enable a secure boot, can protect a device from firmware vulnerabilities, helps shield the operating system from attacks, and helps prevent unauthorized access to devices and data with advanced access controls and authentication systems AMD Shadow Stack offers hardware enabled protection against control-flow attacks AMD Secure Processor integrated on-chip to help protect sensitive data Exclusive to AMD Processors with PRO technologies, AMD Memory Guard provides real time encryption of system memory to help protect against physical attacks should your laptop be lost or stolen Industry partnerships support multi-layered approach AMD PRO Manageability For simplified deployment and management that is compatible with your current infrastructure, every AMD Ryzen PRO processor includes a comprehensive set of open standards based, CPU agnostic management features, including support for Asset Inventory, KVM, Remote Management Firmware Updates, and Microsoft Endpoint Manager. The AMD Ryzen PRO 6000 Series processors include two new features: Wireless support for 32+ widely used DASH profiles AMD Manageability Processor -- a dedicated processor integrated into the CPU for enhanced wireless manageability AMD PRO Business Ready AMD Ryzen PRO processors are designed for quality, reliability, and longevity to deliver the long-term consistency IT managers need to simplify IT planning and make smart investments for future-ready computing.
warranty: Product is thoroughly tested and completely functional without any issues. We also provide a one month warranty from our end.
